item.title: 施纳贝尔讲话后德国债券收益率创九个月新高
item.description: 在欧洲中央银行的一位高级成员表示，她对投资者押注下一次加息举措将是加息感到放心之后，德国基准借贷成本升至 3 月份以来的最高点。【原文：German benchmark borrowing costs rose to the highest since March after a senior member of the European Central Bank said she’s comfortable with investors betting the next interest-rate move will be a hike.】

item.title: 印度瞄准私营企业驱动的 450 亿美元太空经济
item.description: 印度正在加速实现其太空雄心，目标是在未来十年内实现持续的月球存在，这是到 2047 年成为发达经济体的更广泛计划的一部分。【原文：India is accelerating its space ambitions, targeting a sustained lunar presence within the next decade as part of its broader plan to become a developed economy by 2047.】

item.title: 英格鲁在泰克收购投票前撤回激励决议
item.description: 英美资源集团（Anglo American Plc）在股东就其收购泰克资源有限公司（Teck Resources Ltd.）投票的前一天，撤回了一项关于高管激励的决议。【原文：Anglo American Plc withdrew a resolution on executive incentives, the day before shareholders vote on its takeover of Teck Resources Ltd.】

item.title: 竞争对手蚕食 Hemnet 的控制权，Hemnet 正与股价下滑作斗争
item.description: 赫姆尼特集团（Hemnet Group AB）创下 4 月份以来的最大单日涨幅，但这丝毫无助于该股摆脱今年欧洲表现最差股票之一的地位，该股的低迷已使瑞典顶级房地产网站失去了在该地区股票基准中的一席之地。【原文：Hemnet Group AB’s biggest daily gain since April did little to shed the stock’s status as one of the worst performers in Europe this year, a slump that has cost Sweden’s top property website its place in the region’s equities benchmark.】

item.title: 联合利华冰淇淋衍生公司 Magnum 以低于参考价开业
item.description: 联合利华公司（Unilever Plc）分拆出来的玛格南冰淇淋公司（The Magnum Ice Cream Co.【原文：Unilever Plc’s spinoff The Magnum Ice Cream Co. opened below the reference price in its market debut on Monday, after a separation aimed at giving the world’s biggest ice cream company a platform to revive its performance as a standalone firm.】

item.title: 亿万富翁霍华德称阿布扎比可媲美伦敦成为全球枢纽
item.description: 亿万富翁艾伦-霍华德（Alan Howard）的对冲基金是阿布扎比最大的对冲基金，他说，这座海湾城市正朝着与伦敦和纽约等西方中心城市一样成为全球金融中心的目标迈进。【原文：Billionaire Alan Howard, whose hedge fund is the largest operating out of Abu Dhabi, said the Gulf city was well on its way to joining Western centres like London and New York as a global financial hub.】

item.title: 万科债券持有人在延期计划投票前会见监管机构
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，在周日与当地监管机构举行的一次会议上，一些中国万科股份有限公司的投资者表达了对该公司推迟债券支付计划的担忧，这给这家陷入困境的开发商增加了压力，而就在几天前，该公司还将就这一提议进行投票表决。【原文：Some China Vanke Co. investors voiced concerns about its plan to delay bond payments at a meeting with local regulators on Sunday, according to people familiar with the matter, adding pressure on the embattled developer just days ahead of a scheduled vote on the proposal.】

item.title: 投资者需求激增，印度首次公开募股筹资额创历史新高
item.description: 印度的首次公开募股创下了 1.77 万亿卢比（约合 196 亿美元）的纪录，因为各家公司都急于抓住投资者对新股的旺盛需求。【原文：India’s initial public offerings have hit a record 1.77 trillion rupees ($19.6 billion), as companies rush to capture the booming investor demand for new shares.】

item.title: 支付初创企业 Airwallex 以 80 亿美元估值融资
item.description: 商业银行和支付公司 Airwallex 在一轮融资中筹集了 3.3 亿美元，估值达 80 亿美元，吸引了包括 T. Rowe Price 和 Robinhood Ventures 在内的投资者。【原文：Airwallex, the business banking and payments firm, raised $330 million in a funding round that valued it at $8 billion and drew investors including T. Rowe Price and Robinhood Ventures.】

item.title: 德国工业生产跃升，支持经济反弹
item.description: 德国工业生产增幅远超预期，支持了经济将在 2025 年最后一个季度恢复增长的假设。【原文：German industrial production rose much more than anticipated, supporting assumptions that the economy will return to growth in the final quarter of 2025.】

item.title: 欧洲央行施纳贝尔表示，如果拉加德提出要求，她将 "准备好 "接任拉加德的职务
item.description: 欧洲中央银行执行董事会成员伊莎贝尔-施纳贝尔（Isabel Schnabel）表示，当克里斯蒂娜-拉加德的任期在不到两年的时间内结束时，她愿意接任总裁一职。【原文：European Central Bank Executive Board member Isabel Schnabel said she’d be willing to take over as president when Christine Lagarde’s term ends in less than two years.】

item.title: 欧莱雅将从 EQT 购入 Galderma 两倍股份
item.description: 欧莱雅集团（L'Oreal SA）从由私募股权公司 EQT AB 牵头的投资集团手中购买了 Galderma Group AG 的股份，从而将其在 Galderma Group AG 的股份增加了一倍，达到 20%。【原文：L’Oreal SA is doubling its stake in Galderma Group AG to 20% with the purchase of shares from an investor group led by private equity firm EQT AB, as the French cosmetics company increases its bet on skincare drugs.】

item.title: 英国富时 100 指数将下跌，英镑保持稳定
法国巴黎银行以 19 亿欧元向 Ageas 出售 AG 保险股份
item.description: 法国巴黎银行（BNP Paribas SA）同意以 19 亿欧元的价格将 AG 保险公司 25% 的股份出售给 Ageas，作为回报，法国巴黎银行将购买这家比利时保险公司价值 11 亿欧元（13 亿美元）的股份。【原文：BNP Paribas SA agreed to sell a 25% stake in AG Insurance for €1.9 billion to Ageas and in return buy a holding worth €1.1 billion ($1.3 billion) in the Belgian insurance firm.】

item.title: 继迪拜之后，Balyasny 与哈德逊湾携手将业务扩展至阿布扎比
item.description: 德米特里-巴利亚斯尼（Dmitry Balyasny）的对冲基金在迪拜开设办事处约两年后，又在阿布扎比设立前哨机构，扩大其在阿联酋的业务，与其他基金经理一起加倍努力，扩大在该地区日益增长的影响力。【原文：About two years after opening an office in Dubai, Dmitry Balyasny’s hedge fund is expanding its presence in the United Arab Emirates with an outpost in Abu Dhabi, joining money managers doubling down on the region’s growing clout.】

item.title: 欧洲央行施纳贝尔 "相当放心 "下一步加息的赌注
item.description: 执行董事会成员伊莎贝尔-施纳贝尔（Isabel Schnabel）对投资者关于欧洲央行下一步将加息的押注表示放心。【原文：Executive Board member Isabel Schnabel is comfortable with investor bets that the European Central Bank’s next interest-rate move will be an increase.】

item.title: 中国政治局确定 2026 年拉动内需的工作重点
item.description: 中国最高领导人将加强内需作为 2026 年经济工作的重中之重，因为中国政府正寻求缓冲全球贸易带来的风险。【原文：China’s top leaders made strengthening domestic demand their top economic priority for 2026, as Beijing seeks a buffer against risks from global trade.】

item.title: 中国房地产公司万达寻求推迟支付 4 亿美元债券
item.description: 大连万达集团的商业地产部门正在寻求将一笔 4 亿美元的债券延期两年，这是中国房地产危机对流动性造成压力之际，又一家寻求延期偿债的开发商。【原文：Dalian Wanda Group’s commercial real estate unit is seeking a two-year extension on a $400 million bond, the latest developer to seek a debt payment delay as China’s property crisis weighs on liquidity.】

item.title: 瑞士联合银行将暂时避免负利率，转而采用 "较小的恶 "利率
item.description: 瑞士国家银行（Swiss National Bank）将提供线索，说明其恢复负利率的门槛有多高，并决定将负利率保持在零。【原文：The Swiss National Bank is set to offer clues on just how high its bar is for a return to negative interest rates with a decision expected to keep them at zero.】

item.title: 俄罗斯波罗的海液化天然气工厂向中国输送首批受制裁天然气
item.description: 俄罗斯的一个液化天然气出口设施向中国交付了自今年 1 月被美国制裁以来的第一批货物，这是北京与莫斯科加强能源合作的最新迹象。【原文：A Russian liquefied natural gas export facility delivered its first shipment to China since being sanctioned by the US in January, the latest sign of increased energy cooperation between Beijing and Moscow.】

item.title: 摩尔之后，中国芯片企业 IPO 覆盖散户近 3000 倍
item.description: 受业内同行摩尔芯线科技股份有限公司（Moore Threads Technology Co.【原文：Two Chinese chipmakers are attracting strong retail investor demand, buoyed by industry peer Moore Threads Technology Co.’s stellar debut.】

item.title: 印度新核电法案将带动价值 2140 亿美元的项目
item.description: 印度政府的一位部长表示，印度计划对其能源法进行全面修订，这将有效地开放其原子能领域，吸引新的投资，从而加入全球核复兴的行列，建设价值高达 19.3 万亿卢比（约合 2 140 亿美元）的核电站。【原文：India’s planned overhaul of its energy laws will effectively open its atomic power sector for new investment, according to a government minister, joining a global nuclear renaissance with a buildout worth as much as 19.3 trillion rupees ($214 billion).】

item.title: 京东工业集团据称将在香港首次公开募股的定价处于市场区间的中间位置
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，JD.com Inc.的供应链技术部门在香港首次公开募股的定价处于市场定价范围的中间位置，共募集资金 29.8 亿港元（约合 3.83 亿美元）。【原文：JD.com Inc.’s supply-chain technology unit raised HK$2.98 billion ($383 million) after pricing its Hong Kong initial public offering in the middle of the marketed range, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 2026 年中国电厂煤炭基准价格将持平
item.description: 据知情贸易商称，中国 2026 年的长期电厂煤炭基准价格已被确定在与今年相同的水平上。【原文：China’s long-term benchmark power-station coal price for 2026 has been set at the same level as this year, according to traders with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: 2026 年看起来风险较小，谨慎乐观情绪较浓
item.description:
市场战略家们看到了许多潜在的令人不快的意外。【原文：

Market strategists see plenty of potentially unpleasant surprises.

】

item.title: 印尼股市前景向好，全球基金转而购买印尼股票
item.description: 随着对东南亚最大市场信心的增强，印尼股市将迎来一年多来首次外国投资者的季度资金流入。【原文：Indonesian stocks are poised for their first quarterly inflow of funds from foreign investors in more than a year, as confidence improves over Southeast Asia’s largest market.】

item.title: 加密货币交易所 Binance 在阿布扎比赢得监管胜利
item.description: Binance 赢得了阿布扎比金融监管机构颁发的三张独立许可证，为这家加密货币交易所巨头提供了迄今为止最全面的监管立足点之一。【原文：Binance has won three separate licenses from Abu Dhabi’s financial regulator, giving the crypto exchange giant one of its most comprehensive regulatory footholds yet.】

item.title: 印度要求首席执行官解释航班混乱原因，IndiGo 股票下跌
item.description: 印度最大的航空公司 IndiGo 的运营公司 InterGlobe Aviation Ltd. 的股价在民航监管机构要求其首席执行官解释印度最严重的空难之一后暴跌。【原文：Shares of InterGlobe Aviation Ltd., which operates India’s largest airline IndiGo, tumbled after the civil aviation regulator demanded the chief executive explain one of the country’s worst air disruptions.】

item.title: 销售担忧加剧空头押注，Pop Mart 股价暴跌 8
item.description: Pop Mart International Group Ltd. 的股价创下六周多来的最大跌幅，原因是人们再次担心这家中国玩具制造商在美国的销售增长势头正在放缓。【原文：Pop Mart International Group Ltd. shares dropped the most in over six weeks amid renewed concern that the Chinese toymaker’s US sales growth momentum is slowing.】

item.title: 德国最高外交官访华伊始大谈对华贸易
item.description: 德国外长约翰-瓦德普尔（Johann Wadephul）抵达中国进行为期两天的访问，此次访问将重点讨论贸易、稀土和乌克兰战争等问题。【原文：German Foreign Minister Johann Wadephul arrived in China for a two-day visit that will focus on trade, rare earths and the war in Ukraine — the nations’ latest effort to reset ties that have been tested in recent months.】
